page.title: 10LOCAL HISTORY THE CASTLE
page.content: Henry V111 was the king who had Yarmouth Castle built of Ashlar stone Yarmouth Castle was built in 1545 and completed in 1547. The reason the castle was built is because the Spanish and French were fighting our country.The French burnt the church down twice.Yarmouth castle was square and was the first castle to have an arrow head bastion. The carved stone came from Sandown Castle.It had 12 guns and 3 cannons.The main entrance isn't used anymore and has a carving of the Tudor coat of arms over it. There was a moat around it,which was 9m.wide and latrines ran down into it. There was a cannon on the top of the castle that could turn round to fire at our enemies.The castle has a gunpowder room and 2 rooms for soldiers _ they were still there until 1885.
